segments.text: Fine , just get it ! We have been shopping for furniture for five hours ! I ’ m so tired !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We still need to find an armoire and a dresser .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine ! I am going to go home and drop off this nightstand , coffee table and love seat while you look for the rest of the things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Pick me up in about an hour because I think I ’ ll also get a bean bag and a dining set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: While you are at it can you pick out a nice recliner ? I really want one so I can watch TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Recliner ? In my beautifully decorated living room ? I don ’ t think so !
segments.speaker: S1
